Uses of Class
com.ui.table.ColumnDefinition

Packages that use ColumnDefinition
com.ui.table This package contains all classes and interfaces needed to work in tandem with common JTable derived components. 
modules.rtv This is a common package containing the classes and interfaces for managing RTV related modules. 
modules.transfer This is a common package containing the classes and interfaces for managing Transfer related modules.

Methods in com.ui.table with parameters of type ColumnDefinition
 boolean ColumnModelBuilder.addCol(ColumnDefinition def)
          Creates a TableColumn instance and adds it to the table model using def and adds the def instance to the list of column definitions that is maintained by this class.
